mapper.select: SELECT c."id" , c.name , c.description , c.create_date , c.modify_date , c.status , (SELECT u.user_name FROM user_ u WHERE u.id = c.create_by) as "create_by" , (SELECT u.user_name FROM user_ u WHERE u.id = c.modify_by) as "modify_by" FROM category c WHERE status != #{status}

SELECT c."id" , c.name , c.description , c.create_date , c.modify_date , c.status , (SELECT u.user_name FROM user_ u WHERE u.id = c.create_by) as "create_by" , (SELECT u.user_name FROM user_ u WHERE u.id = c.modify_by) as "modify_by" FROM category c WHERE status = #{status} AND id = #{id}
